name: Apple Flautas
author: Mel Ohhhh
summary: Cinnamon-apple filling deep-fried in a flour tortilla and drizzled with confectioners' glaze. This easy apple flauta treat will become a favorite!
ingredients: 2  Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and chopped
1 tablespoon milk, or more as needed
directions: Stir apples, sugar, and cinnamon together in a small saucepan over medium heat until apples are tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Spoon 2 or 3 heaping tablespoons of mixture into each tortilla; roll tortillas into cylinders that are 1 inch in diameter
Warm 1/2 inch of oil in a frying pan over medium heat
Place 2 flautas carefully into the hot oil with metal tongs and fry until light golden brown on all sides, 3 to 4 minutes
Mix confectioners' sugar, milk, and vanilla extract together in a small bowl until smooth and consistency is slightly thick, but pourable
